SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, N.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(BOARD_TITLE, 0, 4) = '[긴급]' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END), CREATE_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC ) N ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET CATEGORY_NO = ? , BOARD_TITLE = ? , BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO BETWEEN 10 AND 12
INSERT INTO BOARD( BOARD_NO , BOARD_WRITER , CATEGORY_NO , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , ANSWER_STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL , 1 , ? , 1 , ? , ? , NULL )
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT MAX(BOARD_NO) PN FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO < ? AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MIN(BOARD_NO) NN FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO > ? AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'
